item.title: bodypix
item.description: let bodypix; let segmentation; let img; let bodies = {confusing:8, fashion:28, guys:5}; let bodytype = ""; const options = { multiplier: 0.75, outputStride: 16, // 8, 16, or 32, default is 16 segmentationThreshold: 0.5, // 0 - 1, defaults to 0.5 }; // ../images/bodies(name)-(random ate o bodies #).jpg function preload() { bodytype = Object.keys(bodies)[floor(random(Object.keys(bodies).length))]; bodylength = ceil(random(bodies[bodytype])); img = loadImage('../images/bodypix/' + bodytype + '-' + bodylength + '.jpg'); bodypix = ml5.

item.title: simple cube
item.description: const loader = new GLTFLoader(); const scene = new THREE.Scene(); const camera = new THREE.PerspectiveCamera( 75, window.innerWidth / window.innerHeight, 0.1, 1000 ); const renderer = new THREE.WebGLRenderer(); renderer.setSize( window.innerWidth, window.innerHeight ); document.body.appendChild( renderer.domElement ); const geometry = new THREE.BoxGeometry(); const material = new THREE.MeshBasicMaterial( { color: 0x00ff00 } ); const cube = new THREE.Mesh( geometry, material ); scene.add( cube ); camera.position.z = 5; const animate = function () { requestAnimationFrame( animate ); cube.

item.title: spin scroll
item.description: let scene, camera, renderer; function init() { scene = new THREE.Scene(); scene.background = new THREE.Color(0xdddddd); camera = new THREE.PerspectiveCamera(40,window.innerWidth/window.innerHeight,1,5000); camera.rotation.y = 45/180*Math.PI; camera.position.x = 800; camera.position.y = 100; camera.position.z = 1000; controls = new THREE.OrbitControls(camera, renderer.domElement); controls.addEventListener('change', renderer); hlight = new THREE.AmbientLight (0x404040,100); scene.add(hlight); directionalLight = new THREE.DirectionalLight(0xffffff,100); directionalLight.position.set(0,1,0); directionalLight.castShadow = true; scene.add(directionalLight); light = new THREE.PointLight(0xc4c4c4,10); light.position.set(0,300,500); scene.add(light); light2 = new THREE.PointLight(0xc4c4c4,10); light2.position.set(500,100,0); scene.add(light2); light3 = new THREE.PointLight(0xc4c4c4,10); light3.
